abstracts.cdata!:
The Kurunegala Rural Development Project
            aims to assist in raising productivity, employment, incomes
            and living standards and to develop a replicable model for
            rural development for other districts in Sri Lanka. The
            project will provide for rehabilitation of existing
            irrigation schemes accompanied by improved water management
            practices to fully exploit the irrigation potential, and for
            programs for replanting/underplanting, intercropping and
            fertilizing of smallholder coconut plantations. The project
            will also strengthen agricultural extension services,
            improve the supply of input services such as fertilizer
            distribution and seeds supplies, and lay the foundation for
            a viable agriculture credit system. These directly
            productive investments will be complemented by investments
            in transportation, health, education, water supply and rural electrification.
